title: 2022 Pivot Firebird Enduro MTB gets size-specific carbon layup & geometry to go faster
content:
Pivot Cycles are unapologetic in their aim; to make the fastest bike at the EWS. The new Pivot Firebird 29 is an out-and-out race bike, redesigned to be longer, stiffer, bigger and faster.
